<
identifier:"Link"
space:" "
identifier:"href"
=
{
expr:"props.href"
}
>
space:"\n"
space:"      "
<
identifier:"button"
>
space:"\n"
space:"        "
{
expr:"props.children"
}
space:"\n"
space:"        "
<
identifier:"style"
space:" "
identifier:"jsx"
>
space:"\n"
space:"          "
{
expr:"`\n            button "
expr:"{"
expr:"\n              outline: none;\n              height: 33px;\n              border: 1px solid #ccced1;\n              text-decoration: none;\n              background: white;\n              border-radius: 6px;\n              padding: 6px 11px 8px 11px;\n              display: inline-block;\n              user-select: none;\n              color: #3b434b;\n              font-size: 15px;\n              font-weight: 700;\n              cursor: pointer;\n            "
expr:"}"
expr:"\n\n            button:hover "
expr:"{"
expr:"\n              border-color: #aaa;\n            "
expr:"}"
expr:"\n\n            button:active "
expr:"{"
expr:"\n              border-color: #aaa;\n            "
expr:"}"
expr:"\n          `"
}
space:"\n"
space:"        "
</
identifier:"style"
>
space:"\n"
space:"      "
</
identifier:"button"
>
space:"\n"
space:"    "
</
identifier:"Link"
>
space:"\n"
space:"  "
text:")\n}\n"
